---
title: "OS Badges/Certificates/Tokens"
---

```{r}
#| message: false
#| echo: false

library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)

os_award_prizes <- read_csv('os_badges_certificates_tokens.csv') %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(across(1:2, ~str_squish(str_trim(.)))) 

reactable(os_award_prizes %>% set_names(~ str_to_title(.) %>%
                  str_replace_all('_', ' ')) %>% 
            rename(URL=Link, 
                   `Notes (N/S: not specified)`=`Notes n s not specified`), 
          resizable = TRUE,
          defaultPageSize = 60,
          wrap = TRUE,
          outlined = TRUE,
          striped = TRUE, searchable = TRUE,
          defaultColDef = colDef(minWidth = 100),
          columns = list(
            URL = colDef(cell = function(value) 
              { htmltools::tags$a(href = value, target = "_blank", value)
              })
  )
)
```
